parameters.query:
SELECT 
  e.id,
  e.nome,
  e.cnpj,
  e.regime_tributario,
  e.email_contato,
  e.telefone,
  u.email as contador_email,
  u.raw_user_meta_data->>'full_name' as contador_nome
FROM empresas e 
JOIN auth.users u ON e.user_id = u.id 
WHERE e.status = 'ativa' 
ORDER BY e.nome
LIMIT 100
